trans-unit.source: How to Debug Scripts in Windows PowerShell ISE
trans-unit.target: 如何在 Windows PowerShell ISE 中调试脚本

trans-unit.source: How to Debug Scripts in Windows PowerShell ISE
trans-unit.target: 如何在 Windows PowerShell ISE 中调试脚本

trans-unit.source: This topic describes how to debug scripts on a local computer by using the Windows PowerShellÂ® Integrated Scripting Environment (ISE) visual debugging features.
trans-unit.target: 本主题介绍如何通过使用 Windows PowerShellÂ® 集成脚本环境 (ISE) 直观调试功能来调试本地计算机上的脚本。

trans-unit.source: How to manage breakpoints
trans-unit.target: 如何管理断点

trans-unit.source: How to manage a debugging session
trans-unit.target: 如何管理调试会话

trans-unit.source: How to step over, step into, and step out while debugging
trans-unit.target: 如何在调试过程中步越、步入和步出

trans-unit.source: How to display the values of variables while debugging
trans-unit.target: 如何在调试时显示变量的值

trans-unit.source: How to manage breakpoints
trans-unit.target: 如何管理断点

trans-unit.source: A breakpoint is a designated spot in a script where you would like operation to pause so that you can examine the current state of the variables and the environment in which your script is running.
trans-unit.target: 断点是脚本中你想要操作暂停的指定位置，这样你可以检查变量的当前状态和脚本运行的环境。

trans-unit.source: Once your script is paused by a breakpoint, you can run commands in the Console Pane to examine the state of your script.
trans-unit.target: 一旦你的脚本被断点暂停，你可以在控制台窗格中运行命令来检查你的脚本状态。

trans-unit.source: You can output variables or run other commands.
trans-unit.target: 你可以输出变量或运行其他命令。

trans-unit.source: You can even modify the value of any variables that are visible to the context of the currently running script.
trans-unit.target: 甚至可以修改对正在运行的脚本的上下文可见的任何变量的值。

trans-unit.source: After you have examined what you want to see, you can resume operation of the script.
trans-unit.target: 检查完你想要查看的内容后，可以恢复该脚本的运行。

trans-unit.source: You can set three types of breakpoints in the Windows PowerShell debugging environment:
trans-unit.target: 可以在 Windows PowerShell 调试环境中设置三种类型的断点：

trans-unit.source: **Line breakpoint**.
trans-unit.target: 行断点

trans-unit.source: The script pauses when the designated line is reached during the operation of the script
trans-unit.target: 在脚本运行期间，当达到所指定的行时，脚本暂停

trans-unit.source: Variable breakpoint.
trans-unit.target: 变量断点。

trans-unit.source: The script pauses whenever the designated variable’s value changes.
trans-unit.target: 每当指定变量的值发生更改时，脚本暂停。

trans-unit.source: Command breakpoint.
trans-unit.target: 命令断点。

trans-unit.source: The script pauses whenever the designated command is about to be run during the operation of the script.
trans-unit.target: 在脚本运行期间，每当要运行指定命令时，脚本暂停。

trans-unit.source: It can include parameters to further filter the breakpoint to only the operation you want.
trans-unit.target: 它可以包括参数，以便仅对所需操作进一步筛选断点。

trans-unit.source: The command can also be a function you created.
trans-unit.target: 该命令还可以是你创建的函数。

trans-unit.source: Of these, in the Windows PowerShell ISE debugging environment, only line breakpoints can be set by using the menu or the keyboard shortcuts.
trans-unit.target: 其中，在 Windows PowerShell ISE 调试环境中，只有行断点可以通过使用菜单或键盘快捷方式进行设置。

trans-unit.source: The other two types of breakpoints can be set, but they are set from the Console Pane by using the [Set-PSBreakpoint [m2]](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/88d2d9ad-17dc-44ae-99aa-f841125b9dc8) cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 可以设置其他两种类型的断点，但应通过使用 [Set-PSBreakpoint [m2]](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/88d2d9ad-17dc-44ae-99aa-f841125b9dc8) cmdlet 从控制台窗格中进行设置。

trans-unit.source: This section describes how you can perform debugging tasks in Windows PowerShell ISE by using the menus where available, and perform a wider range of commands from the Console Pane by using scripting.
trans-unit.target: 本部分介绍了如何通过使用菜单（若有）在 Windows PowerShell ISE 中执行调试任务，并通过脚本从控制台窗格中执行更广泛的命令。

trans-unit.source: To set a breakpoint
trans-unit.target: 设置断点

trans-unit.source: A breakpoint can be set in a script only after it has been saved.
trans-unit.target: 仅当保存脚本后，才可以在其中设置断点。

trans-unit.source: Right\-click the line where you want to set a line breakpoint, and then click **Toggle Breakpoint**.
trans-unit.target: 右键单击你想要设置行断点的行，然后单击“切换断点”。

trans-unit.source: Or, click the line where you want to set a line breakpoint, and press **F9** or, on the **Debug** menu, click **Toggle Breakpoint**
trans-unit.target: 或者，单击你想要设置的行断点所在的行，然后按 **F9**，或在“调试”菜单上，单击“切换断点”

trans-unit.source: The following script is an example of how you can set a variable breakpoint from the Console Pane by using the [Set-PSBreakpoint](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/6afd5d2c-a285-4796-8607-3cbf49471420) cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 以下脚本是如何通过使用 [Set-PSBreakpoint](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/6afd5d2c-a285-4796-8607-3cbf49471420) cmdlet 从控制台窗格中设置变量断点的示例。

trans-unit.source: List all breakpoints
trans-unit.target: 列出所有断点

trans-unit.source: Displays all breakpoints in the current Windows PowerShellÂ® session.
trans-unit.target: 在当前 Windows PowerShellÂ® 会话中显示所有断点。

trans-unit.source: On the **Debug** menu, click **List Breakpoints**.
trans-unit.target: 在“调试”菜单上，单击“列表断点”。

trans-unit.source: The following script is an example of how you can list all breakpoints from the Console Pane by using the [Get-PSBreakpoint](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/0bf48936-00ab-411c-b5e0-9b10a812a3c6) cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 以下脚本是如何通过使用 [Get-PSBreakpoint](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/0bf48936-00ab-411c-b5e0-9b10a812a3c6) cmdlet 从控制台窗格中列出所有断点的示例。

trans-unit.source: Remove a breakpoint
trans-unit.target: 移除断点

trans-unit.source: Removing a breakpoint deletes it.
trans-unit.target: 移除断点会将其删除。

trans-unit.source: If you think you might want to use it again later, consider [disabling](#bkmk_disable) it instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果你认为稍后还可能再次使用，请考虑改为[禁用](#bkmk_disable)。

trans-unit.source: Right\-click the line where you want to remove a breakpoint, and then click **Toggle Breakpoint**.
trans-unit.target: 右键单击你想要移除的断点所在的行，然后单击“切换断点”。

trans-unit.source: Or, click the line where you want to remove a breakpoint, and on the **Debug** menu, click **Toggle Breakpoint**.
trans-unit.target: 或者，单击你想要移除的断点所在的行，然后在“调试”菜单上，单击“切换断点”。

trans-unit.source: The following script is an example of how to remove a breakpoint with a specified ID from the Console Pane by using the [Remove-PSBreakpoint](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/4c877a80-0ea0-4790-9281-88c08ef0ddd6) cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 以下脚本是如何通过使用 [Remove-PSBreakpoint](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/4c877a80-0ea0-4790-9281-88c08ef0ddd6) cmdlet 从控制台窗格中移除具有指定 ID 的断点的示例。

trans-unit.source: Remove All Breakpoints
trans-unit.target: 移除所有断点

trans-unit.source: To remove all breakpoints defined in the current session, on the **Debug** menu, click **Remove All Breakpoints**
trans-unit.target: 若要移除在当前会话中定义的所有断点，在“调试”菜单上，单击“移除所有断点”

trans-unit.source: The following script is an example of how to remove all breakpoints from the Console Pane by using the [Remove-PSBreakpoint](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/4c877a80-0ea0-4790-9281-88c08ef0ddd6) cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 以下脚本是如何通过使用 [Remove-PSBreakpoint](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/4c877a80-0ea0-4790-9281-88c08ef0ddd6) cmdlet 从控制台窗格中移除所有断点的示例。

trans-unit.source: Disable a Breakpoint
trans-unit.target: 禁用断点

trans-unit.source: Disabling a breakpoint does not remove it; it turns it off until it is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 禁用断点不会将断点移除；只是会将其关闭，直至启用。

trans-unit.source: To disable a specific line breakpoint, right\-click the line where you want to disable a breakpoint, and then click **Disable Breakpoint**.
trans-unit.target: 若要禁用特定行断点，右键单击你想要禁用的行断点所在的行，然后单击“切换断点”。

trans-unit.source: Or, click the line where you want to disable a breakpoint, and press **F9** or, on the **Debug** menu, click **Disable Breakpoint**.
trans-unit.target: 或者，单击你想要禁用的断点所在的行，然后按 **F9**，或在“调试”菜单上，单击“禁用断点”。

trans-unit.source: The following script is an example of how you can remove a breakpoint with a specified ID from the Console Pane by using the [Disable-PSBreakpoint](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/d4974e9b-0aaa-4e20-b87f-f599a413e4e8) cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 以下脚本是如何通过使用 [Disable-PSBreakpoint](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/d4974e9b-0aaa-4e20-b87f-f599a413e4e8) cmdlet 从控制台窗格中移除具有指定 ID 的断点的示例。

trans-unit.source: Disable All Breakpoints
trans-unit.target: 禁用所有断点

trans-unit.source: Disabling a breakpoint does not remove it; it turns it off until it is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 禁用断点不会将断点移除；只是会将其关闭，直至启用。

trans-unit.source: To disable all breakpoints in the current session, on the **Debug** menu, click **Disable all Breakpoints**.
trans-unit.target: 若要禁用在当前会话中的所有断点，在“调试”菜单上，单击“禁用所有断点”。

trans-unit.source: The following script is an example of how you can disable all breakpoints from the Console Pane by using the [Disable-PSBreakpoint](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/d4974e9b-0aaa-4e20-b87f-f599a413e4e8) cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 以下脚本是如何通过使用 [Disable-PSBreakpoint](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/d4974e9b-0aaa-4e20-b87f-f599a413e4e8) cmdlet 从控制台窗格中禁用所有断点的示例。

trans-unit.source: Enable a Breakpoint
trans-unit.target: 启用断点

trans-unit.source: To enable a specific breakpoint, right\-click the line where you want to enable a breakpoint, and then click **Enable Breakpoint**.
trans-unit.target: 若要启用特定断点，右键单击你想要启用的断点所在的行，然后单击“启用断点”。

trans-unit.source: Or, click the line where you want to enable a breakpoint, and then press **F9** or, on the **Debug** menu, click **Enable Breakpoint**.
trans-unit.target: 或者，单击你想要启用的断点所在的行，然后按 **F9**，或在“调试”菜单上，单击“启用断点”。

trans-unit.source: The following script is an example of how you can enable specific breakpoints from the Console Pane by using the [Enable-PSBreakpoint](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/739e1091-3b3f-405f-a428-bec7543e5df0) cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 以下脚本是如何通过使用 [Enable-PSBreakpoint](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/739e1091-3b3f-405f-a428-bec7543e5df0) cmdlet 从控制台窗格中启用特定断点的示例。

trans-unit.source: Enable All Breakpoints
trans-unit.target: 启用所有断点

trans-unit.source: To enable all breakpoints defined in the current session, on the **Debug** menu, click **Enable all Breakpoints**.
trans-unit.target: 若要启用在当前会话中定义的所有断点，在“调试”菜单上，单击“启用所有断点”。

trans-unit.source: The following script is an example of how you can enable all breakpoints from the Console Pane by using the [Enable-PSBreakpoint](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/739e1091-3b3f-405f-a428-bec7543e5df0) cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 以下脚本是如何通过使用 [Enable-PSBreakpoint](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/739e1091-3b3f-405f-a428-bec7543e5df0) cmdlet 从控制台窗格中启用所有断点的示例。

trans-unit.source: How to manage a debugging session
trans-unit.target: 如何管理调试会话

trans-unit.source: Before you start debugging, you must set one or more breakpoints.
trans-unit.target: 开始调试之前，必须设置一个或多个断点。

trans-unit.source: You cannot set a breakpoint unless the script that you want to debug is saved.
trans-unit.target: 你不能设置一个断点，除非已保存你想要调试的脚本。

trans-unit.source: For directions on of how to set a breakpoint, see [How to manage breakpoints](#bkmk_1) or [Set-PSBreakpoint](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/6afd5d2c-a285-4796-8607-3cbf49471420).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何设置断点的说明，请参阅[如何管理断点](#bkmk_1)或 [Set-PSBreakpoint](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/6afd5d2c-a285-4796-8607-3cbf49471420)。

trans-unit.source: After you start debugging, you cannot edit a script until you stop debugging.
trans-unit.target: 开始调试后，将无法编辑脚本，除非停止调试。

trans-unit.source: A script that has one or more breakpoints set is automatically saved before it is run.
trans-unit.target: 运行之前，将自动保存设置有一个或多个断点的脚本。

trans-unit.source: To start debugging
trans-unit.target: 启动调试

trans-unit.source: Press **F5** or, on the toolbar, click the **Run Script** icon, or on the **Debug** menu click **Run\/Continue**.
trans-unit.target: 按 **F5** 或在工具栏上，单击“运行脚本”图标，或在“调试”菜单上，单击“运行/继续”。

trans-unit.source: The script runs until it encounters the first breakpoint.
trans-unit.target: 脚本将一直运行，直到它遇到第一个断点。

trans-unit.source: It pauses operation there and highlights the line on which it paused.
trans-unit.target: 它将在此处暂停操作，并突出显示它暂停时所在的行。

trans-unit.source: To continue debugging
trans-unit.target: 继续调试

trans-unit.source: Press **F5** or, on the toolbar, click the **Run Script** icon, or on the **Debug** menu, click **Run\/Continue** or, in the Console Pane, type **C** and then press **ENTER**.
trans-unit.target: 按 **F5** 或在工具栏上，单击“运行脚本”图标，或在“调试”菜单上，单击“运行/继续”或在控制台窗格中，键入 **C**，然后按 **ENTER**。

trans-unit.source: This causes the script to continue running to the next breakpoint or to the end of the script if no further breakpoints are encountered.
trans-unit.target: 这将导致脚本继续运行到下一个断点，或如果接下来没有遇到任何断点的话运行到脚本的末尾。

trans-unit.source: To view the call stack
trans-unit.target: 查看调用堆栈

trans-unit.source: The call stack displays the current run location in the script.
trans-unit.target: 调用堆栈会显示脚本中的当前运行位置。

trans-unit.source: If the script is running in a function that was called by a different function, then that is represented in the display by additional rows in the output.
trans-unit.target: 如果脚本在由其他函数调用的函数中运行，则会由输出中的附加行在显示中表示。

trans-unit.source: The bottom\-most row displays the original script and the line in it in which a function was called.
trans-unit.target: 最底行显示原始脚本以及脚本中调用函数所在的行。

trans-unit.source: The next line up shows that function and the line in it in which another function might have been called.
trans-unit.target: 下一行显示该函数以及函数中可能调用了另一个函数所在的行。

trans-unit.source: The top\-most row shows the current context of the current line on which the breakpoint is set.
trans-unit.target: 最顶行显示设置了断点的当前行的当前上下文。

trans-unit.source: While paused, to see the current call stack, press **CTRL\+SHIFT\+D** or, on the **Debug** menu, click **Display Call Stack** or, in the Console Pane, type **K** and then press **ENTER**
trans-unit.target: 在暂停时，若要查看当前调用堆栈，请按 **CTRL+SHIFT+D**，或在“调试”菜单上，单击“显示调用堆栈”，或在控制台窗格中，键入 **K**，然后按 **ENTER**

trans-unit.source: To stop debugging
trans-unit.target: 停止调试

trans-unit.source: Press **SHIFT\-F5** or, on the **Debug** menu, click **Stop Debugger**, or, in the Console Pane, type **Q** and then press **ENTER**
trans-unit.target: 按 **SHIFT-F5**，或在“调试”菜单上，单击“停止调试器”，或者，在控制台窗格中，键入 **Q**，然后按 **ENTER**

trans-unit.source: How to step over, step into, and step out while debugging
trans-unit.target: 如何在调试过程中步越、步入和步出

trans-unit.source: Stepping is the process of running one statement at a time.
trans-unit.target: 单步执行是一次运行一条语句的过程。

trans-unit.source: You can stop on a line of code, and examine the values of variables and the state of the system.
trans-unit.target: 你可以在一个代码行上停止，然后检查变量的值和系统状态。

trans-unit.source: The following table describes common debugging tasks such as stepping over, stepping into, and stepping out.
trans-unit.target: 下表描述了常见的调试任务，如步越、步入和步出。

trans-unit.source: Debugging Task
trans-unit.target: 调试任务

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 说明

trans-unit.source: How to accomplish it in PowerShell ISE
trans-unit.target: 如何在 PowerShell ISE 中完成它

trans-unit.source: Step Into
trans-unit.target: 步入

trans-unit.source: Executes the current statement and then stops at the next statement.
trans-unit.target: 执行当前的语句，然后在下一个语句处停止。

trans-unit.source: If the current statement is a function or script call, then the debugger steps into that function or script, otherwise it stops at the next statement.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前语句是一个函数或脚本调用，则调试器将单步调试该函数或脚本，或者停止在下一条语句上。

trans-unit.source: Press **F11** or, on the **Debug** menu, click **Step Into**, or in the Console Pane, type **S** and press **ENTER**
trans-unit.target: 按 **F11**，或在“调试”菜单上，单击“步入”，或者，在控制台窗格中，键入 **S**，然后按 **ENTER**

trans-unit.source: Step Over
trans-unit.target: 步越

trans-unit.source: Executes the current statement and then stops at the next statement.
trans-unit.target: 执行当前的语句，然后在下一个语句处停止。

trans-unit.source: If the current statement is a function or script call then the debugger executes the whole function or script, and it stops at the next statement after the function call.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前语句是一个函数或脚本调用，则调试器将执行整个函数或脚本，或者在函数调用后在下个语句处停止。

trans-unit.source: Press **F10** or, on the **Debug** menu, click **Step Over**, or in the Console Pane, type **V** and press **ENTER**
trans-unit.target: 按 **F10**，或在“调试”菜单上，单击“步越”，或者在控制台窗格中，键入 **V**，然后按 **ENTER**

trans-unit.source: Step Out
trans-unit.target: 步出

trans-unit.source: Steps out of the current function and up one level if the function is nested.
trans-unit.target: 跳出当前函数，如果函数是嵌套的则返回上一级。

trans-unit.source: If in the main body, the script is executed to the end, or to the next breakpoint.
trans-unit.target: 如果在主正文中，脚本将执行到末尾，或到下一个断点。

trans-unit.source: The skipped statements are executed, but not stepped through.
trans-unit.target: 将执行跳过的语句，但不会单步遍历。

trans-unit.source: Press **SHIFT\+F11**, or on the **Debug** menu, click **Step Out**, or in the Console Pane, type **O** and press **ENTER**
trans-unit.target: 按 **SHIFT+F11**，或在“调试”菜单上，单击“步出”，或者，在控制台窗格中，键入 **O**，然后按 **ENTER**

trans-unit.source: Continue
trans-unit.target: 继续

trans-unit.source: Continues execution to the end, or to the next breakpoint.
trans-unit.target: 继续执行到结束，或到下一个断点。

trans-unit.source: The skipped functions and invocations are executed, but not stepped through.
trans-unit.target: 将执行已跳过的函数和调用，但不会进行单步遍历。

trans-unit.source: Press **F5** or, on the **Debug** menu, click **Run\/Continue**, or in the Console Pane, type **C** and press **ENTER**
trans-unit.target: 按 **F5**，或在“调试”菜单上，单击“运行/继续”，或者，在控制台窗格中，键入 **C**，然后按 **ENTER**

trans-unit.source: How to display the values of variables while debugging
trans-unit.target: 如何在调试时显示变量的值

trans-unit.source: You can display the current values of variables in the script as you step through the code.
trans-unit.target: 单步遍历代码时，可以在脚本中显示变量的当前值。

trans-unit.source: To display the values of standard variables
trans-unit.target: 显示标准变量的值

trans-unit.source: Use one of the following methods:
trans-unit.target: 使用以下方法之一：

trans-unit.source: In the Script Pane, hover over the variable to display its value as a tool tip.
trans-unit.target: 在脚本窗格中，将鼠标悬停在变量上，以在工具提示中显示它的值。

trans-unit.source: In the Console Pane, type the variable name and press **ENTER**
trans-unit.target: 在控制台窗格中，键入变量的名称并按 **ENTER**

trans-unit.source: All panes in ISE are always in the same scope.
trans-unit.target: ISE 中的所有窗格始终位于同一作用域中。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, while you are debugging a script, the commands that you type in the Console Pane run in script scope.
trans-unit.target: 因此，调试脚本时，你在控制台窗格中键入的命令在脚本作用域中运行。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to use the Console Pane to find the values of variables and call functions that are defined only in the script.
trans-unit.target: 这样，你便可以使用控制台窗格查找变量的值，并调用仅在脚本中定义的函数。

trans-unit.source: To display the values of automatic variables
trans-unit.target: 显示自动变量的值

trans-unit.source: You can use the preceding method to display the value of almost all variables while you are debugging a script.
trans-unit.target: 调试脚本时，可以使用前述方法显示几乎所有变量的值。

trans-unit.source: However, these methods do not work for the following automatic variables.
trans-unit.target: 但是，这些方法不适用于以下自动变量。

trans-unit.source: $Input
trans-unit.target: $Input

trans-unit.source: $MyInvocation
trans-unit.target: $MyInvocation

trans-unit.source: $PSBoundParameters
trans-unit.target: $PSBoundParameters

trans-unit.source: $Args
trans-unit.target: $Args

trans-unit.source: If you try to display the value of any of these variables, you get the value of that variable for in an internal pipeline the debugger uses, not the value of the variable in the script.
trans-unit.target: 如果你尝试显示这些变量中的任何一个的值，你将获取调试器使用的内部管道中变量的值，而不是脚本中变量的值。

trans-unit.source: You can work around this for a few variables ($\_, $Input, $MyInvocation, $PSBoundParameters, and $Args) by using the following method:
trans-unit.target: 对于一些变量（$_、$Input、$MyInvocation、$PSBoundParameters 和 $Args），你可以过使用以下方法解决此问题：

trans-unit.source: In the script, assign the value of the automatic variable to a new variable.
trans-unit.target: 在脚本中，将自动变量的值分配给一个新变量。

trans-unit.source: Display the value of the new variable, either by hovering over the new variable in the Script Pane, or by typing the new variable in the Console Pane.
trans-unit.target: 通过将鼠标悬停在脚本窗格中新变量上，或通过在控制台窗格中键入新变量来显示新变量的值。

trans-unit.source: For example, to display the value of the $MyInvocation variable, in the script, assign the value to a new variable, such as $scriptname, and then hover over or type the $scriptname variable to display its value.
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要显示 $MyInvocation 变量的值，在脚本中，将该值分配给一个新变量（如 $scriptname），然后将鼠标悬停在 $scriptname 变量上，或键入 $scriptname 变量以显示其值。

trans-unit.source: See Also
trans-unit.target: 另请参阅

trans-unit.source: Using the Windows PowerShell ISE
trans-unit.target: 使用 Windows PowerShell ISE
